::Shadow Wing/Spears::

Shadow Wing::
She flew out of the entrance dodging fire and heading skyward.

Spears::
She pulled a quill out of her side and extended it into a spear. she 
walked towards the entrance. "Well. I'd hate to miss this party. Hey 
Striker," she smiled at him,"At least I don't have to fly this time."
she looked at him.  If anything happened, she wanted to remember him 
as he was right then. She smiled and put his image in her memory 
banks.

She turned and ran down the hallway with her spear in hand wanting to 
stick it into a Pred.
